column4: Gabriel_:i learned linux back in 1999 in about a year, and that was before it practically set itself up :)
i remember when getting quake 2 to work was a total pain in the a$$ :P

the problem i have is, that ubuntu does not let me see everything on a view. I used it for more than a few weeks but some features were just overload, so that i kicked it off for having another try in summerholidays.
Earmaster is a program for musicians training the inner sound imagination
